title: No bugles, no drums
creator_credit: Seven Emus Productions, Australian Film Commission, Debra Beattie-Burnett and John Burnett
brief_description: The untold story of Aboriginal involvement in World War II. This program promises to be a striking reminder of the contribution made by the Aboriginal people during Australia’s darkest hours.
creator_credit_for_label: Seven Emus Productions, Australian Film Commission, Debra Beattie-Burnett and John Burnett
